body: CALL this a tale of two coaches. One is Frank Layden, 53 years old, who is in his fourth season with the Utah Jazz. Here is a man who combines the dry wit of Henny Youngman with the waistline of Dumbo, a trait he hails with quips like, ''What's wrong with this body? The only thing wrong is that it's inside this other body. Or, ''In India, they'd
title: FRIENDS ACROSS THE MOUNTAINS
